legacy.full_text:
What does it take to be a Chinese official?
How's public policy formulated? 
In what ways does the gov't serve the people?
And how can it be held accountable?

Documentary | Chinese Mayors [4K] ➡️https://t.co/LyEX2geTB3
A must-watch

#China #Documentary #ChineseMayors #Democracy https://t.co/kCvtB8rNPR

Documentary | Chinese Mayors [4K]
➡️ https://t.co/LyEX2geTB3

In this 106-min production, #ChineseMayors, I travel across #China with experts from around the world to find out how #democracy here differs from in the West!

I've put my heart & soul into this one. Hope you like it! https://t.co/BRDexagYEF

legacy.full_text:
Why is #Italy withdrawing from #BRI? Because #Washington "called the Italian PM &pressed her to stop the initiative," says President of #Italy BRICS Institute &former senator @vitopetrocelli

"It's a very bad decision...It's not good for Italy. It's good for #USA." 

#BeltandRoad https://t.co/XStynmvDEn

FYI: Within #BeltandRoad framework, #Italy's exports to #China have risen, bilateral trade volume has risen, & the majority of its enterprises are optimistic about working with China. Italy was the guest of honor at expos here. The two also planned to build cruise ships together.

value.string_value: In tense times, we should use the arts to find common ground.
Opinion | For the U.S. and China, It Starts With Listening

legacy.description: News tips? Share them here: https://t.co/ghL9OoYKMM
legacy.name: The New York Times

legacy.full_text:
"Americans must try to understand the hopes, dreams & aspirations of the Chinese people."

For the #US & #China, it starts with listening, wrote opera singer & arts envoy @CarlaDCanales on @nytimes, urging the 2 nations to listen & learn from one another.

https://t.co/7Wcp5wFvXU
